splash.title: Selling Skills
splash.caption: MATCH FEATURES TO WANTS AND NEEDS
splash.introduction:
Knowing your lineup is your bread and butter. It pushes the conversations, builds rapport and ultimately puts the customer in the perfect vehicle. That means satisfation and great first step in building customers for life.

This game will help you learn the ins and outs of every new vehicle in your brand line-up. Click the button to start playing.
